div.p: Splunk Impact Cloud (SIC) is the production environment for Splunk4Good (S4G), Splunk's corporate social responsibility program.

ul.li: Take the SIC skillset survey if you wish to contribute to S4G SIC-related projects.
Latest news and information at our Pwny Portal page.
A list of S4G projects is located in Confluence.
Join our Slack room, #splunk4good, to get involved with S4G projects!

div.p: Please contact Satoshi Kawasaki (s@splunk.com) for questions, comments, and issues regarding SIC and its apps.
